channel.title: CVE Feed for ktlint -- ktlint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ktlint -- ktlint

item.title: CVE-2019-1010260|2024-08-05T03:07:18.513Z -- ktlint -- ktlint
item.description: Using ktlint to download and execute custom rulesets can result in arbitrary code execution as the served jars can be compromised by a MITM. This attack is exploitable via Man in the Middle of the HTTP connection to the artifact servers. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 0.30.0 and later; after commit 5e547b287d6c260d328a2cb658dbe6b7a7ff2261.
